entries.waypoint_description_1: This is where a cave of outcast Nightsisters is rumored to live.
entries.player_sorry: Sorry no, haven't had time yet. Will get right on it.
entries.player_reset: I've decided that it's probably not a good idea for me to head in to that area.
entries.player_3_1: Why would this be interesting information?
entries.player_2_1: Nightsisters, from what I've heard about them, I should stay as far away from where ever they are as possible. No thanks.
entries.player_1_1: Sounds interesting, I will see what I can find out.
entries.npc_reward_1: Spiders eh? Hmm interesting, we may have to put together a strike force and see if we can capture some species.
entries.npc_reset: Didn't take you for the spineless type. Well I'm sure someone more courageous can assist me then.
entries.npc_noloc_1: I have lots of things to do, but nothing for you right now.
entries.npc_failure_1: Bah, thought I could count on you doing this! Get out of here; I have no use for imbeciles.
entries.npc_backtowork_1: Good, the sooner I get this information the better. Get to it soldier!
entries.npc_4_1: Well if we can find a common variable in the way they tame their rancors and these creatures, we may be one step closer to...well but that's classified information.
entries.npc_3_1: Thought you were more skilled than you are I guess.
entries.npc_2_1: Good, I know they have their base of operations somewhere in this area. Let me know what you find out.
entries.npc_1_1: Lets see, yes, you could probably assist me. I've heard of a clan of the dangerous Nightsisters that has developed a strange symbiosis with some other creatures than the Rancor. I'd appreciate it if you could find out what's going on out there.
entries.next: I have lots of things to do, but nothing for you right now.
entries.cant_work: You already have plenty of things to worry about, come back when your less occupied.
